item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, November 26, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Teen Mathematicians Tie Knots Through a Mind-Blowing Fractal (59 points | 3 comments)

7. LLVM-powered devirtualization (137 points | 2 comments)

10. The AI reporter that took my old job just got fired (173 points | 190 comments)

23. Poisoning the Day (150 points | 64 comments)

26. 'The Best of All Possible Worlds' Review: Leibniz Lives Again (69 points | 50 comments)

28. DEA passenger searches halted after watchdog finds signs of rights violations (127 points | 134 comments)
29. Revisiting the DOS Memory Models (165 points | 89 comments)
30. Amazon S3 Adds Put-If-Match (Compare-and-Swap) (488 points | 146 comments)
